name: WELCOME to LingmeiShen's WORLD
body:
### welcome
This is a collection of some of my technical work related to quantitative finance. Homework sets, papers I've authored,  Python programs, and blog posts are all fair game.

### Python in Finance
We use Python in some of our classes, and here is some of my work:
* [Basics notebook](https://github.com/LingmeiShen/qfrm.git)
* [Secret notebook](https://github.com/pbenson/qfrm-bootcamp/blob/gh-pages/python-templates/python-secret-notebook-empty.ipynb)

### Papers
* [Paper 1](https://github.com/aslkdfj)
* [Paper 2](https://github.com/aslkdfj)

### About me
I am a grad student at the University of Michigan, in the [Quantitative Finance and Risk Management](https://lsa.umich.edu/math/graduates/quantitative-finance.html) program. I was an undergraduate student majoring in finance in Lingnan College, Sun Yat-sen University in China. I've done research with.... My hobbies are....
